verses.verse: My breath<WH7307> is corrupt<WH2254>, my days<WH3117> are extinct<WH2193>, the graves<WH6913> are ready for me. breath: or, spirit is spent
Are there not mockers<WH2049> with me? and doth not mine eye<WH5869> continue<WH3885> in their provocation<WH4784>? continue: Heb. lodge
Lay down<WH7760> now, put me in a surety<WH6148> with thee; who is he that will strike<WH8628> hands<WH3027> with me?
For thou hast hid<WH6845> their heart<WH3820> from understanding<WH7922>: therefore shalt thou not exalt<WH7311> them.
He that speaketh<WH5046> flattery<WH2506> to his friends<WH7453>, even the eyes<WH5869> of his children<WH1121> shall fail<WH3615>.
He hath made<WH3322> me also a byword<WH4914> of the people<WH5971>; and aforetime<WH6440> I was as a tabret<WH8611>. aforetime: or, before them
Mine eye<WH5869> also is dim<WH3543> by reason of sorrow<WH3708>, and all my members<WH3338> are as a shadow<WH6738>. my members: or, my thoughts
Upright<WH3477> men shall be astonied<WH8074> at this, and the innocent<WH5355> shall stir up<WH5782> himself against the hypocrite<WH2611>.
The righteous<WH6662> also shall hold<WH270> on his way<WH1870>, and he that hath clean<WH2890> hands<WH3027> shall be<WH3254> stronger and stronger<WH555>. be: Heb. add strength
But<WH199> as for you all, do ye return<WH7725>, and come now<WH935>: for I cannot find<WH4672> one wise<WH2450> man among you.
My days<WH3117> are past<WH5674>, my purposes<WH2154> are broken off<WH5423>, even the thoughts<WH4180> of my heart<WH3824>. the thoughts: Heb. the possessions
They change<WH7760> the night<WH3915> into day<WH3117>: the light<WH216> is short<WH7138> because<WH6440> of darkness<WH2822>. short: Heb. near
If I wait<WH6960>, the grave<WH7585> is mine house<WH1004>: I have made<WH7502> my bed<WH3326> in the darkness<WH2822>.
I have said<WH7121> to corruption<WH7845>, Thou art my father<WH1>: to the worm<WH7415>, Thou art my mother<WH517>, and my sister<WH269>. said: Heb. cried, or, called
And where is now<WH645> my hope<WH8615>? as for my hope<WH8615>, who shall see<WH7789> it?
They shall go down<WH3381> to the bars<WH905> of the pit<WH7585>, when our rest<WH5183> together<WH3162> is in the dust<WH6083>.
